channel.title: Basket of eggs
channel.description: when i wield basket of eggs it skipps for about 2-3 secounds how do i get it to go non-stop?

item.title: Basket of eggs
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“ibo448, post:3, topic:438856”]this is the code for the basket of eggs emote thing

if(c.wearId == 4565) {
c.sendMessage(“Enjoy Skipping!!!”);
c.startAnimation(1836);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}[/quote]

Did you even read what I said?
I’m not going to spoonfed you, just do what I said to fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Basket of eggs
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

loop the animation,
like in delta it would be using
pEmote = #; //This loops the animation
instead of setAnimation(#); //this does the whole animation once

I suppose you use PI, so take a look to what different codes get used for animations

Read full topic
